    • calculateRoots

      public static double[] calculateRoots(double[] coeffs)
      Calculates the roots of the quadratic equation ax^2 + bx + c.
      Parameters:
      coeffs - An array of doubles representing the coefficients a, b, and c.
      Returns:
      An array of doubles containing the roots of the equation if they are real, null if the roots are complex.
